content: .search-field{position:relative;height:100%;.input-field{margin:0!important;padding:0!important;}label{position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);left:20px;transition:all 0.2s;}input[type="text"]{width:100%;height:100%;cursor:pointer;position:relative;background:transparent;transition:all 0.2s;z-index:5;border:1px solid grey;margin:0!important;padding:0 10px!important;&::placeholder{opacity:0;}&:hover { border: 1px solid #007bff;}&:focus,&:not(:placeholder-shown){&+label{transform:translateY(-50%);}}}&__submit{position:relative;position:absolute!important;width:25px;height:25px;z-index:10;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%);left:auto;right:23px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;cursor:pointer;margin:0!important;padding:0!important;&::after{content:"";position:absolute;width:25px;height:25px;top:0;left:0;background:rgb(29,128,1,65%);display:none!important;}}input[type="submit"]{position:relative;width:100%;height:100%;font-size:0;z-index:10;background-color:transparent;cursor:pointer;margin:0!important;padding:0!important;&::after{content:"";display:none!important;}&+img{display:block!important;cursor:pointer;width:15px!important;height:15px!important;position:absolute!important;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);z-index:5;margin:0!important;padding:0!important;transition:all 0.2s;}&:hover{&+img{width:20px!important;height:20px!important;padding:5px!important;border:1px solid rgb(29,128,1,25%);}}}}
